content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Greetings Mr. Wang, I appreciate your interest in viewing the apartment in Munich. To commence our discussion on the rental price, please propose an amount that you find suitable for this desirable location and newly built property. Once you provide a figure, I'll consider it and respond accordingly.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I think 700 Euro per month is a reasonable price for an apartment like this. Considering the location and the size of the apartment, I think it's a fair price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While I understand your perspective on the appealing location and size of the apartment, I must evaluate my options to maximize my returns as a landlord. At this moment, I find the proposed price of 700 Euro per month insufficient for my goals. However, please keep this conversation open as future negotiations may yield different outcomes. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
